meanings.definition: Lacking air or having no air
meanings.sent1: The room felt airless and hot during the power outage.
meanings.sent2: The basement was so airless that it was hard to breathe.
meanings.sent3: The airless elevator made everyone feel like sardines in a can.
meanings.sent4: The airless silence of the desert at night was eerie.
meanings.sent5: The airless attic was filled with old trunks and memories.

meanings.sent1: The small, airless office made me feel claustrophobic.
meanings.sent2: The airless gym locker room smelled of sweat and dampness.
meanings.sent3: The airless bus ride left everyone feeling sticky and uncomfortable.
meanings.sent4: The airless conference room made it hard to focus during the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The airless car ride in traffic seemed never-ending.

meanings.sent1: The airless subway car was packed with commuters during rush hour.
meanings.sent2: The airless nightclub was filled with dancing bodies and loud music.
meanings.sent3: The airless waiting room made the patients feel like they were in a sauna.
meanings.sent4: The airless classroom felt suffocating with all the students inside.
meanings.sent5: The airless party was so crowded that it was hard to move around.
